tool.name: IDConflictResolver
tool.description: Resolves ambiguous annotations of features with peptide identifications
tool.command:
IDConflictResolver
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if
tool.help:
Resolves ambiguous annotations of features with peptide identifications
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_IDConflictResolver.html
